titleStmt.title: The preceptes of warre, setforth [sic] by Iames the erle of Purlilia, and tra[n]slated into englysh by Peter Betham
De rei militari. English
titleStmt.author: Porcia, Jacopo di, conte, 15th cent.
Betham, Peter.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the olde Iewery by Edwarde Whytchurche. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendu[m] solu[m] These bookes are to be solde at the weste dore of Pauls, by William Telotson],

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Porcia, Jacopo di. De re militari.
Printer's and bookseller's names from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
